about.title: About Us
content: Welcome to Keep 4 Me! We are a note-taking app designed to help you stay organized and productive.
Our mission is to provide a simple and intuitive platform for creating and managing your notes.
Start using Keep 4 Me today and keep your important information at your fingertips!

contact.title: Contact
content: If you have any questions, feedback, or need support, please feel free to reach out to us.
